text: Edward Leslie Butler (25 February 1908 – 1985) was an English professional footballer who played in the Football League for Mansfield Town. ==References== Category:1908 births Category:1985 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:English Football League players Category:Derby County F.C. players Category:Southend United F.C. players Category:Mansfield Town F.C. players Category:Ollerton Colliery F.C. players
title: Leslie Butler (footballer)
